execution_plan.description: Get users (id, username, email) from the application who have at least one post.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id AS id, u.username AS username, u.email AS email FROM users u WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM posts p WHERE p.user_id = u.id);

execution_plan.description: Get usernames of chat users who have sent at least one message, restricted to usernames returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT u.username AS username FROM users u JOIN messages m ON m.sended_by = u.id WHERE u.username IN ($step1.username);
